resources.string: Error connecting to google services, automatic objective completion will not work
Welcome to Quest for Thessaloniki! A live game/tourist guide for all who come to visit our beautiful city.
Next we will guide through the ways that you can complete your quest.

There are 2 types of objectives in the game. Visiting a Point of interest and finding and scanning the various QR codes(part of the ThessWiki Project) that provide information about the site you visit through Wikipedia articles

 You define the points of interest that you want to visit yourself by selecting them and complete them by opening the map in the game when you are close to their location.

 To complete the ThessWiki objectives, use the QR scanner in the game and scan the QR code and the objective for this particular site will appear completed in your list.
If the objective wont complete automatically you can complete it manually by selecting the objective and clicking the ✓ icon… but don\'t cheat ;)
There are 3 kinds of Points of interest at this moment and new ones will be added later on. You can select any of them to be added to your objectives.
You can view their location on the map by selecting the corresponding icon in the details.
When you complete a certain number of objectives an achievement will be unlocked!
Share your latest achievement with your friends!
This concludes the introduction of the game. You can revisit this guide by clicking the info button at the top right of the main screen.
We hope you enjoy the game/app as much as we enjoyed making it :)
View all the points of interest and complete your objectives!
Complete ThessWiki objectives by scanning the QR codes!
View the various POIs and add them as your objectives!
See the achievements you have unlocked!
